short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to fetch poster,relased,boxoffice,genre & IDMb ratings for movies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our "9Movies For PC, Windows, and Mac" Fetch movie details effortlessly with our Chrome extension: posters, release dates, box office earnings, genres, and IMDb ratings.

✅This is my extension features:

1) Enter Movie Title: If you provide the name of any movie here, you can use the Chrome extension to easily fetch poster, release date, box office earnings, genre, and IMDb ratings for movies. 

2)  Fetch Movie : Enter the movie title and click 'Fetch Movie' to generate an awesome poster fetch.

3) Easy To use

4) Simple Extension

✅ How To Use 9Movies  on PC?

Step 1: Start by adding this extension to your Chrome browser by clicking "Add to Chrome."

Step 2: Next, click on the Extension icon.

Step 3: You will see:

"Enter Movie Title"

"Fetch Movie"

Step 4: If you enter any movie title here, our Chrome extension seamlessly retrieves the poster, release date, box office earnings, genre, and IMDb ratings. Simply input the title and click 'Fetch Movie' for an exceptional poster fetch.

Step 5: Enjoy a safer browsing experience!

✅ Disclaimer:

Please note that " 9Movies  for PC, Windows, and Mac" Chrome Extension is an independent product and is not associated, affiliated, or endorsed by the 9Movies  Android app or its developers. We respect intellectual property rights and make no claim to any copyrights associated with the 9Movies  Android app.
